format: preprocessor and shell script snippets within a Makefile or Yocto recipe
description: This file appears to be a Yocto build recipe fragment (.inc file) for the OpenSSL 1.0.2o library, containing metadata, build configuration, and custom functions used in the build process.

methods.name: openssl_replace_absolute_symlinks
methods.description: Walks through the specified directory, replacing absolute symlinks with relative ones based on the directory structure.

methods.name: install_relative_symlinks
methods.description: Calls 'openssl_replace_absolute_symlinks' during install to ensure symlinks are relative.
